messages.title: Remember the Post Office closures?
messages.content: Until 18 months ago I was the sub postmistress of the Balham High Road post office. In 2008 the Post Office Ltd decided to close us along with seven other local post offices.

messages.title: We need an MP who will put our community first
messages.content: I have left the Labour Party and will not be voting for Sadiq Khan. Instead I will cast my vote for the Conservative Party’s candidate, Mark Clarke. He has stood up for us long after the issue left the headlines.

politicalExperience.achievements: I was the sub postmistress of the Balham High Road post office.

endorsements.endorsement: I have left the Labour Party and will not be voting for Sadiq Khan. Instead I will cast my vote for the Conservative Party’s candidate, Mark Clarke.

images.caption: CLOSED BY LABOUR - Balham High Road Post Office

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. If you come to my new shop, CeX Entertainment Electronics, 51 Mitcham Road, Sw17 9PB, I'll be happy to talk further.
